          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="hu">Jean-Baptiste Tuby: Apolló-kút. 1668-70. Versailles, a királyi kastély kertje. Bronz.</string>
            <string language="en">Jean-Baptiste Tuby: Fountain of Apollo, 1668-70. Versailles, the garden of the royal palace, brass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jean-Baptiste Tuby: Brunnen von Apollo, 
1668-70. Versailles, der Garten des königlichen Palastes, 
Messing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jean-Baptiste Tuby : Fontaine d'Apollo, 
1668-70. Versailles, le jardin du palais royal, laiton</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jean-Baptiste Tuby: Fonte de Apollo, 1668-70.
Versalhes, o jardim do palácio real, bronze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Jean-Baptiste Tuby: Fontana di Apollo, 
1668-70. Versailles, il giardino del palazzo reale, ottone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Ιεαν- Baptiste Tuby: Πηγή απόλλωνα, 
1668-70. Βερσαλλίες, ο κήπος του βασιλικού παλατιού, 
ορείχαλκος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jean-Baptiste Tuby: Fuente de Apolo, 1668-70.
Versalles, el jardín del palacio real, latón</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Vizmedence közepén álló szoborcsoport a napszekeret hajtó Apollóval</string>
            <string language="en">statue group is standing in the middle of the waterpool with Apollo who drives sunwain</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Tuby,  </string>
            <string language="en">Tuby,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Statuegruppe steht mitten in dem waterpool mit 
Apollo, der sunwain antreibt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le groupe de statue se tient au milieu du 
waterpool avec Apollo qui pilote le sunwain</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o grupo da estátua está estando no meio do 
waterpool com Apollo que dirige o sunwain</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il gruppo della statua sta levandosi in piedi nel 
mezzo del waterpool con Apollo che guida il sunwain</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η ομάδα αγαλμάτων στέκεται στη μέση του waterpool 
με απόλλωνα που οδηγεί sunwain</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el grupo de la estatua está estando parado en el 
centro del waterpool con Apolo que conduzca el sunwain</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tuby,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tuby,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tuby,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tuby,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Tuby,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tuby,</string>
          </keyword>
